abstract: The 15-car accident at a race in Las Vegas killed Dan Wheldon, a two-time winner of the Indianapolis 500.
snippet: The 15-car accident at a race in Las Vegas killed Dan Wheldon, a two-time winner of the Indianapolis 500.
lead_paragraph: Dan Wheldon, a two-time winner of the Indianapolis 500, died Sunday afternoon after a 15-car wreck at a race in Las Vegas. The video above, posted on the North American Racing League's YouTube channel, begins with shots from the roof of Mr. Wheldon's car and then pans out to show the enormous pile-up that tore race cars into piece and swallowed some of them in flames.

headline.main: Video of Deadly Race Car Crash
